subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant scored 40 points and Serge Ibaka had 19 points, 17 rebounds and 5 blocked shots as Oklahoma City beat visiting Dallas, 111-105, in overtime.
snippet: Kevin Durant scored 40 points and Serge Ibaka had 19 points, 17 rebounds and 5 blocked shots as Oklahoma City beat visiting Dallas, 111-105, in overtime.
